name: Flickr in Dark Mode
description:
v1.0.2
Flickr in dark mode. Tired of the brightness of Flickr pages? Install this to browse Flickr without applying sunscreen first.
additional_info:
History:

v1.0.2 - 2020-03-22 - fixes for mail and stats popup in photo details
v1.0.1 - 2020-03-21 - assorted additions and improvements
v1.0 - 2020-03-21 - initial release
